jump_scares.spoiler: A man opens a closet door and a body falls out
During a dream, Tricia approaches her husband who has his back turned to her. He suddenly turns around and is shown to be missing his eyes
Tricia suddenly has a vision of her husband as she closes the door
While lying in bed, Tricia has a vision of her husband kneeling over her
Tricia sees her husband standing behind the lawyer
While meditating, Tricia hallucinates that her husband is beside her whispering in her ear
There is a strange chirping noise in the room next to Daniel and Callie, seconds later a large insect like creature crawls past
As Callie investigates the bathroom, something comes out from behind the shower curtain and the screen goes black
The insectoid briefly appears out of the darkness before the screen goes black again
With a loud thud a pack of syringes drops from the chimney
The slit closes onto Scott’s fingers
Kate opens doors, startling Nick
Tony has abrupt flashbacks of Kate falling
A creature jumps towards the phone camera
“I see you” message appears on the TV
Abrupt jump cut with a sound effect
Nick jumps onto Tony
TV explodes
Tony breaks through the glass pane
A loud sound over intercom interrupts Odell
A lightbulb explodes
A radio turns as Stumbo is getting close the body, causing him to fall backwards down a ladder in fright
As Claire pushes the closet door closed it suddenly opens back up and an image of a man flashes across the screen
Brice shines light on some men as he turns around, frightening him
A manta ray charges towards the camera
A loud banging sound frightens the group
Odell shines the flashlight down at the water and Coors’ dead body suddenly rises up from it
Odell grabs Claire on the shoulder, causing her to scream
Wallace begins to freak out and shout as Odell touches his shoulder
Claire grabs the files and when she turns back around Odell is standing right in front of her
The woman suddenly screams while driving, followed by a cut to a deformed looking man on the car window
A vulture suddenly screeches and flies into the car through a side window
There is a wide shot of some ruins while Paul is driving down a road. Suddenly, a burnt hand appears on one of the bricks accompanied by a string sound effect
Paul reaches in for the water, and Djinn’s hand suddenly reaches out of it and grabs him
While a woman is hiding and trying to be quiet, her phone begins to loudly ring
Tom suddenly calls out to Owen while he’s texting, startling him
Something big is dropped into the water while Dodger is swimming
More stuff is suddenly dropped into the pool
Owen turns on the light, and with a loud string sound effect Tom is revealed to be sitting on a chair and staring at him
The killer suddenly walks by in the background
Owen walks away from the window and the killer takes a step forward to reveal he is outside
While the headmistress is talking, there is an abrupt very loud sound of someone opening the door that startles Owen
The killer walks by in the foreground
Mercedes wipes the steam off the mirror, revealing the killer in the background and causing her to scream
The killer suddenly grabs Lewis while he’s looking down at Owen from the railings
While climbing down a cube hatch, Cassandra is suddenly grabbed on the leg
Upon crawling through a passage a woman is suddenly dragged upwards
A corpse suddenly springs back up and makes a gasping noise
A scary face flashes up on Casey’s laptop. [Video]
A woman dressed in white appears beside Frank’s car window
Laura pokes at a skull on the wall and it falls to the floor, startling her
Brad peeks at the baby and discovers that it is dead
Richard gets out of the car to investigate the baby’s pram on the road, as he looks in he pretends to be pulled into the carriage and eaten
There is a loud noise and the car shakes as a tire blows out
There is a sudden bump as the car hits something
Frank lights a match and the woman in white is standing right behind him
The silhouette of someone appears at the window beside Marion
Marion turns around and runs into the woman in white
As Ray clicks through the endlessly scrolling hallway, a ghost suddenly appears on screen
Ray’s camera turns back on and a scary face briefly flashes across the window
Rachel clicks the painting of the forest and it opens a video file, and a scary face immediately flashes in front of the camera in the video
The image of Amy with her face covered immediately shifts to reveal her face is distorted
There is a loud screech and the screen begins to glitch out

The image of Rachel and Amy begins to pop up all over the screen, then all of the images suddenly disappear off the screen to reveal Ray’s face looking very over-exposed and bleeding in front of the camera
A phone rings during a tense scene
A squawking bird suddenly flies at Amanda
Marcus trips over during a quiet scene
A doll enters the room and walks up to Giordani
An unknown assailant comes through the window and strikes Giordani
Marcus shines the torch on a skeleton
An abrupt cut back to Martha in the present may startle some viewers
As Elizabeth leans forward, the railing suddenly breaks and she falls forwards
A wooden plank snaps beneath Elizabeth’s feet and she screams and falls down
A body falls and hits a truck
An elevator drops down close to the building’s repairman
Someone falls onto the top of the elevator causing a loud bang
The devil appears from behind the people who are still alive
A clown doll falls from the ceiling with a loud horn
A skeleton reaches through a break in the wall
The female skeleton slams into the chain fence nd starts screaming
A cartoon clown jumps on the screen right at the camera
A woman starts banging on the car door and screaming
The corpse comes alive for a second facing the soldier
One of the monsters attacks a soldier
The camera suddenly cuts to a monster
A monster suddenly turns around facing the camera
The monster in the corner that disappeared reappears from the side
The camera pans back and reveals Danny standing in the doorway
A cult member runs at Jay
Jay looks in the mirror and a ball hits the window
Jay walks into the kitchen and a girl half naked and peeing walks towards her
The door opens and an unsettling tall man is standing behind Yara in the door-frame. [Video]
Jay opens a closet and the back wall falls apart revealing Kelly behind
Jay crawls towards the shed’s broken door and a boy jumps into the hole
Venna is grabbed from behind inside the corn field
While Fuller is looking through the back window, the truck driver breaks the window from the inside
The face from Alice’s phone footage suddenly comes towards the camera. [Video]
A burning moose jumped in the shot
The whisperer’s mouth abruptly opens, releasing blinding lights onto John
The woman wakes up and grabs Leah
Sudden shift to loud noises
Leah is suddenly hit from behind by her sister
Leah gasps loudly as she is woken up
Leah’s mom goes from sitting on the bed to charging towards her, causing Leah to wake up suddenly with a loud gasp

movies.title: Living Dark: The Story of Ted the Caver

jump_scares.spoiler: The trapdoor Ted and Brad are standing on suddenly breaks and they fall down
A loud noise startles Ted
A very loud noise comes from the other side of the hole
Ted suddenly hits his head
Another very loud noise comes from the other side of the hole
Ted calls out into the cave, followed immediately by a loud noise that startles him and Brad
As Ted turns around, something suddenly pulls down the shower curtain, screeches, and attacks him
Ted wakes up to reveal the last scene was a nightmare. As he gets up, the creature suddenly jumps out from behind him. Basically the common ‘false awakening’ jump scare
A loud noise from behind Ted startles him and he quickly turns around
Ted looks around the room, and when he looks at the doorway, there is a silhoutte standing right behind it
The silhoutte runs straight towards Ted as he turns off the light
Ted gets out from under the sheets and looks around the room. As he turns towards the window, the silhoutte is standing right in front of him
Brad turns around and shines the light of the flare on the creature
Brad looks to his side and camera pans to reveal the creature standing right there
A door slams shut
There is a sudden bang on the door
Paul wakes up and Annie is standing directly over his bed
Annie shoots Buster through the back with a shotgun
Annie jumps on Paul as he crawls away
A drone appears in front of Ian as he climbs the crane
A sudden sound of smashing dishes
As Maddox is in the water, a floating dead body bumps into her
Some children are hiding in a cellar when something breaks through from above
Mike looks out the window and sees a shadow creeping down the street below, suddenly the shadow transforms into a face that appears right at the window
A dog barks at Mike
A hooded figure with a burnt face briefly appears behind Mike
Mike looks at some grainy video camera footage, all of a sudden a scary face pops up on screen
A pan suddenly catches fire
The figures standing outside Mike’s house suddenly catch fire. Seconds later, Mike turns around and has a vision of a large number of children standing in his house
The apparently dead psychic suddenly grabs Mike’s wrist
Kristen turns around suddenly, accompanied by a noise on the soundtrack
A hooded figure attacks Hannah, pushing her out the window
Some birds fly at Mike while he is on the bridge
Mike approaches a woman, when he touches her she bursts into flame and Mike begins to have a flashback
The hooded figure rushes at Mike on the bridge
A shadowy figure suddenly appears on Sami’s car’s back seat
Sami’s car radio comes on
Sami’s car radio comes on, again
As Sami shuts the hood of her car, an shadow of a figure unexpectedly appears on it
As Sami turns around, a man with a bloodied face suddenly appears in her car’s back seat
Accompanied by a sound cue, a figure suddenly appears in a dark doorway
A brick is thrown through a window accompanied by the sound of glass breaking
A man with a knife suddenly lunges at Nick
A boy runs past a girl in a hallway and says “Where are you?”
A man calls out, startling Dr. Arnolds who is napping on a chair
Mr Futterman places a hand on Malcolm’s shoulder after he opens the shower door
As Dr. Arnolds approaches Emily in the corner, she is suddenly attacked by Charlie who screams “I won’t let you!”
As Dr. Arnolds closes the bathroom cabinet she sees a child in the mirror
The door suddenly shuts on Sarah as she goes to check on Daniel
Sarah comes out of a doorway behind Dr. Arnolds
The bed moves across the room
Daniel is pulled under water
A boy runs past Dr. Arnold
The demon appears on top of Daniel
Amado suddenly attacks Dr. Arnold
Some viewers might be startled at two stabbings at this point
Woman says “talk to me” and turns to see a man in front of her
Woman says “talk to me” again and a woman appears in front of her
Woman barks like a dog suddenly
Man says “I let you in” and head tilts backwards
Boy bites girl in the hand
Some viewers might be startled at man lunging at woman
Louis, who appears to be dead, suddenly coughs which startles the mortuary assistant
A book slams down in front of the hamster
A loud sound effect may startle some viewers
A strange looking humanoid creature covered in barnacles suddenly looks up at Dr. Pascal
Greta is surprised by Malcolm
Greta is pulled into the family portrait before waking from a nightmare
The attic door suddenly closes trapping Greta inside
Greta sees a figure causing her to scream and fall down
The attic stairs pull up as Greta and Malcolm are talking
During another nightmare, Brahms’ head suddenly snaps back after Greta moves it
A mirror shatters beside Cole
As Greta and Malcolm try to escape they run into Brahms
Greta goes to open a door and Brahms is standing behind it
Greta sees something move while looking through a gap
Brahms breaks through a wall behind Greta and Malcolm
The title credits appearing on the screen accompanied by a sound effect may startle some
A door opens loudly
After seeing water drip on the floor, Carlos looks up and La Llorona is hovering right above him
La Llorona suddenly runs out of the shadows and grabs Chris around the arm
As Chris shuts the car door, La Llorona appears at the window
The car lock suddenly pops up
Sam lifts the umbrella out of the water and La Llorona suddenly appears in front of her
An unseen force suddenly pushes the door open as Anna holds Chris
The alarm clock suddenly goes off
La Llorona suddenly rushes at Chris from behind the curtains
La Llorona comes out of the room behind Chris and tackles him
La Llorona pushes Sam under the water
Chris points and says “Mom”, causing Anna to look around and see La Llorona’s face right beside her
There is a loud roar from upstairs
Anna and the childen look up to see La Llorona towering above them
The figure under the tablecloth suddenly rushes at the children
The glass behind Rafael suddenly cracks
An unseen force hurls Sam backwards
A shrieking La Llorona suddenly swims at Anna as she approaches Sam
As the sheet drops to reveal La Llorona’s reflection, the glass shatters and she screams at the children
The camera is zoomed in on a sleeping woman’s face, then suddenly cuts to a zoomed out shot to reveal Paul whispering something into her ear, accompanied by a loud sound
During a very misty scene in which almost nothing is visible, the empty man suddenly comes into view right in front of the camera and attacks Davara
There is a sudden cut and a screech during a flashback
James looks out into the hallway and sees a shadowy figure that suddenly springs up to reveal that it’s the empty man
There is a sudden cut to the empty man screeching and running towards the camera
A worker is abruptly and quickly pulled out of the frame
A walkie-talkie suddenly makes a noise
A cracking sound is heard
A hand suddenly reaches through the grate
A loud shriek is heard through the headphones
A man is suddenly pulled toward the mine shaft
A man is grabbed accompanied by a loud sound
A sudden loud monstrous shriek
A creatures face suddenly appears at a door window
A walkie-talkie suddenly makes a sound
A creature suddenly appears behind Arianne
Arianne’s hand is grabbed as she reaches into the water
Yoko turns around in the attic and sees a ghostly woman’s face
Karen opens a door and a hand grabs her foot
A cat yowls, scaring Karen
Karen is startled by the phone ringing
A shadow can be seen passing a window
Emma gasps and a ghostly figure can be seen hovering above her
A hand comes out of a bath tub and grabs a man’s arm
Someone reaches down and grabs the cat on the stairs
A boy pops out from beside Jen’s bed and hisses at Matt
The boy screams at Matt
The boy peers down from above Matt and screams again
As Susan goes up in the elevator, the strange boy can be seen on each floor
The ghostly woman peaks out at Susan from under the covers
Karen sees the reflection of the ghostly girl in the bus window accompanied by a croaking noise
As Alex walks down the stairs, the strange boy can be seen sitting in a corner
Detective Nakagawa is reviewing the security footage when a shadowy figure rises up directly in front of the security camera
The boy opens his eyes then pushes Detective Nakagawa’s head into the bathtub
A corpse falls down from the attic in front of Peter
The ghostly woman can be seen in the reflection of the mirror as Karen walks past it
Doug’s hand reaches out and grabs Karen’s foot as she looks into the mirror
Karen opens a door and sees the ghostly woman’s face behind it
Karen goes to lift the sheet covering Doug’s body when it begins to twitch
The camera begins to pan, revealing the ghostly woman is standing behind Karen
Matt sees a frightening vision in a basement window
A figure can be seen in a mirror as Sara opens a closet door
Matt turns around to see that the water Sara is mopping the floor with has turned to blood
Some plates fall on the floor and break
Matt gets a shock from the door in the basement
Matt has a vision where his hand sinks through a pillar and gets stuck in rotting meat
Matt begins to have another vision
Sara turns around and is surprised by Matt standing in the doorway
A figure runs past Matt
The door slams behind Matt
One of the corpses in the mortuary begins to move
Several of the tattooed corpses are now standing around Matt
Matt sits up and comes face to face with a burnt figure
The burnt figure disappears in a bright flash
Matt starts to have another vision involving Jonah and Aickman
Wendy wakes up as a bird hits the window
As Wendy goes to lift a sheet covering the bird, a foot suddenly appears in view
Sara turns on the bed-side light and sees a corpse standing in front of her. [Video]
The furnace door shuts as Nicholas tries to examine it
Jonah’s spirit suddenly moves closer to Sara and Matt
Jonah’s spirit now stands right behind Sara and Matt
Nicholas looks in the rear view mirror and sees a burnt corpse
A corpse flashes up on the screen during a flash-back to Jonah
The shower curtain suddenly wraps itself around Wendy
An axehead breaks through the door in front of Wendy
A corpse falls down in front of Matt and Sara
Will suddenly swerves to avoid something on the road
Will stands up and smashes his glass
David shoots Miguel
A bloodied Sadie runs into Will
Will slaps the gun out of Pruitt’s hand
The scene abruptly cuts from Jim typing to a very loud gunshot
The Fouke Monster unexpectedly opens a window and reaches its hand inside at the family
The Fouke Monster hits the bathroom window
As Bobby walks back towards the house, he suddenly runs into the Fouke Monster
A bloodied hand comes out of the darkness startling the praying nun
The nun on the ground is pulled away into the darkness
The corpse of the nun hanging from the rope suddenly drops to the ground as a group of ravens fly away
The camera pans around Frenchie several times before a nun corpse drops from a tree knocking him to the ground
After watching a shadowy figure move across the room, Irene looks up at the statue of Jesus when Valek suddenly appears behind Irene’s shoulders and glass shatters over her
Shortly after lighting a match in the coffin, Burke hears some noises and Valek’s hands suddenly grab him and pull him down
A nun grabs Irene by the hand as she approaches the praying nuns
After Burke touches the veil of the abbess, she suddenly turns to reveal she has been possessed by Valek
After Irene picks up a bead from the floor, a nun is standing directly behind her
As Irene looks at the rosary, Valek’s hands break through the wall behind her
As a screaming Irene flees, a hand is placed over her mouth by one of the nuns
As Burke walks towards the exorcised boy, Valek suddenly appears
We see a top down shot of the nuns praying together in a circular pattern. The scene briefly goes quiet before an unseen force flings the nuns across the room
After Burke investigates the ringing noise, a hand reaches out of the ground in front of him
After Irene begins to pray a possessed nun attacks the group
Something roars at Frenchie from the darkness as he walks through the catacombs
A faceless nun appears behind Irene. As she turns around to talk to it another nun appears from the side and attacks her
Frenchie hears a noise as he moves through the group of nuns
There is another slight scare as a nun’s head jerks down behind where Frenchie is standing
As Frenchie approaches Irene she suddenly looks up and roars revealing she has been possessed
The possessed boy from the exorcism drops down behind Burke
Maya closes a cupboard revealing Jurgis behind her in the mirror
Someone jumps out at Sam as a joke
Sam looks around the room and runs into a woman wearing a mask
A woman dressed in white appears in the middle of the road
Someone suddenly runs by
The woman in white suddenly turns around as Fenn puts his hand on her shoulder
A hand reaches up out of the water
Alice bends over towards Father Hagan revealing a demonic figure behind her
A demonic face suddenly appears in Fenn’s reflection as he is looking into the water
Natalie calls Fenn from behind him, but when he turns around she is a demon
An organ starts playing
The demon suddenly reaches for Father Hagan
A body hanging by a noose falls from the ceiling
A motel room door opens
A demonic face suddenly appears on the computer screen
A cover comes off a statue revealing the demon
The demon explodes out of a statue of the Virgin Mary
The demon’s face appears in the light of the match
A man breaks through a door
Accompanied by a sound effect, a masked figure appears on the previously black screen
Accompanied by a sound effect, Allison ducks down to reveal Dr. Powell watching her from the doorway
A man is shown with his neck suddenly cut open
The lights cut out suddenly
Maggie has a sudden vision of a grotesque creature which causes her to fall backwards in fear
The creature’s foot stamps on the ground
Simon opens a door and Kim rushes out
The sudden loud music might startle some viewers
The window cracks in front of Jan
As Jan is looking in the mirror, it breaks and she sees a blindfolded girl
Ellie scares Jan with a green mask while she’s reading in bed
A dramatic zoom in on the writing on the window, with sudden loud music
A strange blue light strikes next to Jan
The lightning strikes again, this time making Jan fall into the water
There is lightning, screaming and intense music during a flashback scene
Jan has a vision of the blindfolded girl
A bird screeches and flies into Jan’s face
A spooky figure suddenly shows up on the screen
A cat jumps at Jan as it screams
